-- input.json --
{
  "dependencies": [
    {
      "import": "myapp.com/web",
      "type": "*Web"
    }
  ],
  "externals": [
  ],
  "target": "gen/web"
}

-- expect.txt --
&web.Web{
  Logs:   []*log.Log{},
  Logger: &web.Logger{logs: []*log.Log{}},
}

-- main.go --
package main

import (
  "os"
  "fmt"
  "github.com/hexops/valast"
  genweb "myapp.com/gen/web"
)

func main() {
  actual := genweb.Load()
  fmt.Fprintf(os.Stdout, "%s\n", valast.String(actual))
}

-- go.mod --
module myapp.com

require (
  github.com/hexops/valast v1.4.1
)

-- log/log.go --
package log

func New() []*Log {
  return []*Log{}
}

type Log struct {}

-- web/web.go --
package web

import (
  "myapp.com/log"
)

func New(logs []*log.Log) *Logger {
  return &Logger{logs}
}

type Logger struct {
  logs []*log.Log
}

type Web struct {
  Logs []*log.Log
  *Logger
}
